Package gui

In this package the abstract graphical user interface is saved.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AnalyseToolBar This ToolBar is placed in the south of the main frame, it is only shown when the game was started.
GameBoard The class represents a game board of a sigma-Game.
GameToolBar This class describes the ToolBar for setting options or drawing graphs for creating the game board.
HelpFrame This class is only to show the help text for using the program.
MainFrame This is the frame started at the beginning.
MoreSolPanel Shows a list of panels, where solutions or kernel elements or other configurations of a trisentis or a gisentis game.
MSPOption This Panel is shown on the right border if on the main frame some solutions or kernel elements are displayed.
SolOptionPanel For a better look this class containers a view of a matrix or a view of a graph or any other component.
 

Package gui Description

In this package the abstract graphical user interface is saved. There are several classes to represent the main frame, the game board and ToolBars for changing properties and analysing the game. Most classes are abstract and must be implemented. The main method in MainFrame starts the program.
